verses.t: The words{H1697} of Nehemiah{H5166} the son{H1121} of Hachaliah{H2446}. And it came to pass in the month{H2320} Chisleu{H3691}, in the twentieth{H6242} year{H8141}, as I was in Shushan{H7800} the palace{H1002},
